message: Oh Doris... Do you need a new pair of glasses??

What?

everyone is laughing at the bullshit of """"alternative facts"""" and missing the point where she says essentially """"(if you guys won't report the way we want you to) we'll have to reevaluate our relationship with the press"""" hinting they will be cut off from access. there is no relationship. the press has a duty to reports fact whether you like it or not. they are under no obligation to further your spin or propaganda. they are not there to be your friend. now a professional, grown up would try to interact with them cordially instead of shouting them down, interrupting and heaping lie upon lie but if you can't manage that then you have no business interacting with them and should stick to a static press release.

I am so sick of everything being a tit for tat issue. My wife and I have had joint accounts since 1990 when we got engaged so my money is hers and hers mine YET when we go to dinner I pay the bill (with our money) when I see her in pain or overloaded it saddens me because I lover her and want to ease her burden NOT because she is week Oh no! She is more than capable of taking care of herself BUT I WANT to cater to her and make sure she knows there is nothing I wouldn't do for her. Chivalry IS NOT DEAD WITH ME! Ladies should be ladies and men should be men. I am not talking about arrogance by the man or dominant / submissive etc. but put your woman on a pedestal and treat her right guys and you will NOT find a more loyal being among all living beings than a woman who feels loved and appreciated.
